title: Ranked Team
body:
Will OCE be getting ranked team back ever so we can play competitive with our lower rank friends?

Flex was good until they added tier restrictions now its just garbage and norms get boring when every team that cant guarantee their win by 20 minutes just surrenders

replies.body: Agreed ranked team really needs to come back flex is awful

Ranked teams rn feels like flex q only because of the fact i'm able to play ranked with my 5 friends.

I currently don't have the issue of tier restrictions unless its silver /plat difference. 

Would be nice to see another ranked queue tho :D
